title: WIN Wednesdays: Linda Bernardi
content: This week’s WIN Wednesday Woman is Linda Benardi. Linda is the author of ProVoke, a book that stirs discussion on the critical importance of global disruption. She also lectures at The University of Washington Bothell MBA program and serves as the CEO of StraTerra Partners, a technology strategy consulting firm.  Linda also carries the roles of angel investor, board member, and advisor in a number of tech companies as well as not-for-profits globally. Previously, she founded and ran a company called ConnecTerra Inc, a software company in the RFID arena that was acquired in 2005. Follow her on Twitter here.
